name: Kagami no Mahou - Azure
description:
Kagami no Mahou - Azure is a singleplayer questgame  for windows. In this game you have to complete different Quests. 

Follow the Character Nilay on his way to put the moon together again. An unknown force has parted the moon into different pieces that you have to collect to fix it again.

  • Collect all the Moonsclices and different other Collectables to finish all the quests.
Gameplay Controls
  • Move (WASD / Arrowkeys  /  Left stick)
  • Look (Left Stick/ Right Stick)
  • Interact (E / Button South)
How to play
  • Download
  • Unzip the Game
  • Play and have fun!
